kpi_info.title: Delete Indirect Data Forward responses sent per cause code
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the number of GTP-C v2 delete indirect data forward responses sent per cause code. Delete Indirect Data Forward Response sent: - S11/S4 interface (MME/SGSN <- SGW)
